shapes

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Shape
    A circle that appears on screen and interacts with other shapes. Many of Circle's useful methods are in its superclass Shape.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Point p)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Checks if this shape contains a given point.
        Specified by:
        contains in class Shape
        Parameters:
        p - a point to check for inside this shape.
        Returns:
        true if p is inside or on the border of this shape.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Shape s)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Checks if this shape contains another given shape.
        Specified by:
        contains in class Shape
        Parameters:
        s - the shape that may be contained in this shape.
        Returns:
        true if s is entirely inside this shape, false otherwise.

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Updates the shape once per frame. When you subclass shape, you'll override this method to do things like move the shape, change its size, etc.
        Specified by:
        update in class Shape

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Initializes the Shape. When you subclass shape, you'll override this method to do things like set the shape's color, set its starting position, etc.
        Specified by:
        setup in class Shape
